name: Drive Isle
description: Drive Isle is an open world driving game mainly focused on random driving and drifting, if you will.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core E8400 processor or equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX580 (2GB RAM) or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 processor or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX970 (4GB RAM) or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Racing Wheel or Gamepad
